snippet.title: Haunted Lands - Official Reveal Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Meet the ranger, werewolf, sorceress, salamander, and veteran in this reveal trailer for Haunted Lands. The trailer showcases these characters in action, the surreal world, and the creepy foes you'll face in this dark and bloody retro-inspired action platformer game. In Haunted Lands, slay grim cultists, infernal minions, and nightmarish creatures. Uncover secrets, acquire powerful artifacts, and face challenging bosses when Haunted Lands launches in 2025 on PC.
